data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Norwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Man City.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Norwich.
Norwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Norwich goal kick.
Man City are coming forward and Joao Cancelo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 6, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Man City.
In Manchester Man City attack through Raheem Sterling. The finish is off target, however.
Norwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Onel Hernandez for Norwich is whistled offside.
Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Gabriel Jesus gives Man City a 1-0 lead in Manchester.
In the minute 13, In Manchester, Raheem Sterling of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Ball safe as Norwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
Craig Pawson awards Norwich a goal kick.
Man City's Gabriel Jesus misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
Free kick for Norwich in the half of Man City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 18, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Norwich, close to Man City's area.
Craig Pawson awards Norwich a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Raheem Sterling (Man City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Norwich goal kick.
Norwich are whistled for offside.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Norwich defender.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City pushes forward through Kyle Walker, whose finish on goal is saved.
Craig Pawson signals a Norwich throw-in in Man City's half.
In the minute 32, David Silva (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Man City to take a throw-in in Norwich territory.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norwich's half?
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Man City in the half of Norwich.
Norwich drives forward and Teemu Pukki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Norwich's Todd Cantwell breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Man City have a goal kick.
Craig Pawson awards Norwich a goal kick.
Throw-in Man City.
In the minute 39, Free kick Man City.
Phil Foden of Man City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Joao Cancelo of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Norwich in their own half.
David Silva for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 42, Norwich have a goal kick.
Free kick for Man City in the half of Norwich.
Man City push forward at Etihad Stadium and David Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Norwich defence.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
The first-half has come to a close in Manchester.
In the minute 45, Goal! Kevin De Bruyne extends Man City's lead to 2-0.
Kyle Walker with an assist there.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Norwich in their own half.
Norwich to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Pep Guardiola (Man City) is making a first substitution, with Riyad Mahrez replacing Phil Foden.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Eric Garcia with Fernandinho. This is the second substitution made today by Pep Guardiola.
Man City are pushing forward but Ilkay Gundogan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Norwich goal kick.
Ilkay Gundogan is replacing Rodri for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Norwich goal kick.
Free kick for Norwich in their own half.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Norwich defence as Joao Cancelo fires in a strike for Man City.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 51, Joao Cancelo is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Norwich in their own half.
Man City's David Silva is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Man City have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson awards Norwich a goal kick.
Norwich needs to be cautious. Man City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
Onel Hernandez of Norwich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Man City are coming forward and Raheem Sterling gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 59, Norwich have a goal kick.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
Ball safe as Norwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Norwich's half?
Important block from the Norwich defence as David Silva fires in a strike for Man City.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 67, Fernandinho of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Norwich have a goal kick.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norwich's half?
In the minute 71, Craig Pawson signals a Man City throw-in in Norwich's half.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norwich's half?
Throw-in for Norwich in their own half.
In the minute 73, Craig Pawson signals a Norwich throw-in in Man City's half.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Norwich in the half of Man City.
In the minute 74, In Manchester, Raheem Sterling of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man City's Gabriel Jesus is on target but unsuccessful.
Man City drives forward and Gabriel Jesus gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Mario Vrancic is replacing Marco Stiepermann for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Norwich at Etihad Stadium.
The away team replace Teemu Pukki with Adam Idah.
Goal! Man City extend their lead to 3-0 through Raheem Sterling.
Kevin De Bruyne instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 81, Man City pushes forward through Riyad Mahrez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Norwich's Adam Idah gets in a shot on goal at Etihad Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's now 4-0 in Manchester as Riyad Mahrez scores for Man City.
In the minute 85, Pep Guardiola is making the team's fourth substitution at Etihad Stadium with Bernardo Silva replacing David Silva.
Can Norwich capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Norwich make their third substitution with Josh Martin replacing Onel Hernandez.
In the minute 88, Craig Pawson awards Norwich a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Norwich drives forward and Josh Martin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick in a good position for Man City!
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Fernandinho's header is off-target for Man City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
It's 5-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Man City take a comfortable 5-0 lead thanks to Kevin De Bruyne.
Norwich's Christoph Zimmermann has been booked in Manchester.
Daniel Farke is making the team's fourth substitution at Etihad Stadium with Jordan Thomas replacing Todd Cantwell.
Akin Famewo is on a sub for Kenny McLean for Norwich.
